rule.name: Social Network Authentication
rule.description: Award points to users when they link their Joomla account to any social network

rule.name: Facebook Comment New
rule.description: Award points to users when leaving Facebook comments on your site.

rule.name: Facebook Comment Delete
rule.description: Remove points from users when deleting their Facebook comments.

rule.name: Facebook Like New
rule.description: Award points to users that Like pages on your site.

rule.name: Facebook Like Remove
rule.description: Remove points to users that Unlike pages on your site.

rule.name: Facebook Friend Request Sent
rule.description: Award points to users that send Facebook Requests to their friends.

rule.name: Google +1 Create
rule.description: Award points to users that use the Google +1 button on your site.

rule.name: Google +1 Remove
rule.description: Take away points from users that remove a Google +1 from your site.

rule.name: Share a page to LinkedIn
rule.description: Award points to users that use the LinkedIn Share button on your site.

rule.name: Tweet a page to your Twitter followers
rule.description: Award points to users that use the Tweet button on your site.
